lu_object_conf Struct Reference
[lu]

Object configuration, describing particulars of object being created. More...

#include <lu_object.h>

Data Fields

loc_flags_t loc_flags
 Some hints for obj find and alloc.

Detailed Description

Object configuration, describing particulars of object being created.

On server this is not used, as server objects are full identified by fid. On client configuration contains struct lustre_md.
